General.Name: JTC Inc
General.Description: JTC Inc. operates tax-free shops in Japan. As of May 21, 2019, it operated 25 stores. The company was formerly known as Japan Tourism Corporation Inc. and changed its name to JTC Inc. in March 2011. JTC Inc. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Fukuoka City, Japan.
General.Address: Hakata Prestige Building, Fukuoka City, Japan, 812-0011
